title: Drew Brees, Twitter share why 'We Choose Louisiana'
text:

Those are the reasons why New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees said he Post to Facebook Drew Brees, Twitter share why 'We Choose Louisiana' NEW ORLEANS -- "Delicious food, dedicated fans & southern hospitality." Those are the reasons why New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees said he  //on.wwltv.com/1LP0gux   Sponsor story provided by Drew Brees, Twitter share why 'We Choose Louisiana' 11:51 a.m. CDT October 22, 2015 Photo: Drew Brees and family (Photo: Drew Brees) 
NEW ORLEANS -- "Delicious food, dedicated fans & southern hospitality." 
Those are the reasons why New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees said he chooses Louisiana. 
Brees sent out a tweet Wednesday night declaring his loyalty to Louisiana and asking others to share the reasons why they choose Louisiana. 
Here are some of their responses.
